meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of muck
meanings.sent1: The pig was the muckiest animal on the farm.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the mud, the children were the muckiest in the group.
meanings.sent3: The muckiest dog in the park rolled around happily in the dirt.
meanings.sent4: The car was so muckiest that it looked like it had been through a mud race.
meanings.sent5: The muckiest pond was home to many frogs and insects.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of mucky, meaning extremely dirty or messy
meanings.sent1: The alley behind the restaurant was the muckiest place in town.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the streets were the muckiest they had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The muckiest room in the house was the one where the kids played.
meanings.sent4: Her shoes were the muckiest at the party, covered in dirt and grime.
meanings.sent5: The muckiest hands belonged to the gardener who worked in the soil all day.
